ygData.msgSnippet: Eight was fine, Rdahl, but ok. ... Firearm grunts in pain as four shots nearly penetrate his back armor, sending pain through his circuits. When he got this

Eight was fine, Rdahl, but ok.

::Firearm::

Firearm grunts in pain as four shots nearly penetrate his back armor, 
sending pain through his circuits. When he got this bot off his back, 
he was going to hurt him very badly, provided that he was still alive.

Firearm swooped down, grabbing his leg, which had been snapped off by 
Menasor, and swinging it behind him, hitting Beastbox hard. His other 
hand reached into a compartment for a pistol. If that didn't work, he 
had other things...



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Beastbox growls at another attempt to throw him off, but to do so, 
this
> Maximal will need to rip off his back, he thought to himself. He 
lowered
> his compression barrels into Firearms back, and fire four times, 
(eight
> shots). "Dont fight Maximal, Beastbox end this fight quick" he said
> savagely.
